name: kindred-paths
description: A tool for managing the cards in Kindred Paths, the custom Magic the Gathering set by Simon Karman.

scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix shared install && npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix mcp install
scripts.precommit: npm run --prefix shared precommit && npm run --prefix server precommit && npm run --prefix client precommit && npm run --prefix mcp precommit
scripts.start: npm --prefix shared run clean && npm --prefix shared run build && npm-run-all --parallel start:*
scripts.start:client: npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix client start
